Subject: Homecoming

From: JP3884@...

    Megatron stuck out his chest in full glory as he, Waspinator, and Adrax 
screached through the sky in the armed vessle. According to the scans there 
was busy ship action, but with a few turrets blasts they were sure not to 
have any serious truoble.
    "When are we going to arrive?" He snapped, turning in the small cabin to 
look at Adrax. He frowed.
    Adrax turned and hissed, "It should be over the horizon very soon, 
Megatron."
    He detected a bit of hated in that hiss, but Megatron ignored it and 
turned to glance out of the window.

    Aracnia set down the transport down in front of the ship with Rampage, 
Inferno, and Tankkor waiting. The three Maxi's were put in the brig.
